author: vmassol
msg: Fixed bug in new HttpClient wrapper in Cactus with regards to the headers returned in the HTTP response (they were offset by one and the status line was not returned as a header).

author: vmassol
msg: * Fixed bug in new HttpClient wrapper in Cactus with regards to the headers returned in the HTTP response (they were offset by one and the status line was not returned as a header).
* Added  a test for HttpUnit integration which tests the previous bug fix

author: vmassol
msg: * Fixed bug in new HttpClient wrapper in Cactus with regards to the headers returned in the HTTP response (they were offset by one and the status line was not returned as a header).
* Added  a test for HttpUnit integration which tests the previous bug fix

author: vmassol
msg: Fixed bug where NullPointerException would be thrown by Cactus ServletTestRunner if an exception raised in a test case had not specified a message (i.e. getMessage() returning null).
